title: Lower Delaware National Wild and Scenic River: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit           The lower Delaware River is situated within two hours drive of the New York City area, and is immediately north of Philadelphia. Along the river you can:  fish, boat, and canoe hike and bike along the scenic towpaths and in other natural areas visit historic towns along the river  You can contact the visitor and information centers in the area for information about the river, and also for commercial services such as restaurants and lodging. On this website you can find information on outdoor activities and historic sites in the Lower Delaware River corridor.
